scripts.build-release: wasm-pack build --out-name compiler --target nodejs --release && RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+simd128" wasm-pack build --out-dir simd --out-name compiler --target nodejs --release --features=simd --target-dir=simd-target
scripts.build: wasm-pack build --out-name compiler --target nodejs --dev && RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+simd128" wasm-pack build --out-dir simd --out-name compiler --target nodejs --dev --features=simd --target-dir=simd-target
